/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -g -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/FfmpegDemo.dir/main.cpp.o  -o FfmpegDemo  -L/usr/local/Cellar/ffmpeg/3.1.4/lib -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/Cellar/ffmpeg/3.1.4/lib -lavcodec -lavdevice -lavfilter -lavformat -lavresample -lavutil -lpostproc -lswresample -lswscale
